snippet: As Jay Leno prepares to leave the “Tonight” show and David Letterman stays put, Jerry Seinfeld, a friend to both, looks at what they have in common.
lead_paragraph: As Jay Leno prepares to leave the “Tonight” show and David Letterman stays put, Jerry Seinfeld, a friend to both, looks at what they have in common.

headline.main: The Ballad of Leno and Letterman, Told by Seinfeld
